org_job_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
org_job_positions.description: The highest-ranking executive, responsible for overall company strategy and decision-making

org_job_positions.title: Chief Operating Officer (COO)
org_job_positions.description: Oversees the company's day-to-day operations and ensures operational efficiency

org_job_positions.title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
org_job_positions.description: Provides overall financial strategy, oversees financial operations, manages investment decisions, and ensures financial integrity.

org_job_positions.title: Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO)
org_job_positions.description: Plan, organise, direct, control and coordinate policies concerning the personnel, industrial relations and occupational safety and health of an enterprise or organisation, or of enterprises that provide human resource services to other enterprises and organisations.

org_job_positions.title: Chief Marketing Officer (CMO)
org_job_positions.description: Leads the marketing department, developing strategies to promote the company's products or services

org_job_positions.title: Chief Information Officer (CIO)
org_job_positions.description: Manages the company's IT strategy and infrastructure

org_job_positions.title: Industrial Engineering Manager
org_job_positions.description: Plan and manage all aspects of industrial engineering activities, conduct studies to maximize workflow, and recommend equipment for production lines

org_job_positions.title: Treasury Manager
org_job_positions.description: Manages the company's liquidity, investments, and financial assets, oversees cash flow, and develops strategies to optimize financial resources.

org_job_positions.title: Risk Manager
org_job_positions.description: Identifies and assesses financial risks, develops risk management strategies and policies, and works to mitigate potential financial losses.

org_job_positions.title: Supply Chain Manager
org_job_positions.description: Oversees purchasing and supply chain finance, negotiates with suppliers, manages contracts, and works towards reducing costs without compromising on quality.

org_job_positions.title: Accountant
org_job_positions.description: Manages financial records, prepares financial statements, handles accounts payable and receivable, and ensures compliance with accounting standards.

org_job_positions.title: Financial Controller
org_job_positions.description: Supervises the accounting team, manages company ledgers, ensures compliance with financial regulations, and maintains financial reporting integrity.

org_job_positions.title: Financial Officer
org_job_positions.description: Develops financial plans and forecasts, analyzes market trends, oversees budgeting, and manages financial risks.

org_job_positions.title: Financial Analyst
org_job_positions.description: Analyzes financial data, identifies trends, prepares reports, and provides recommendations to improve financial performance.

org_job_positions.title: Audit Clerk
org_job_positions.description: Records day-to-day financial transactions, maintains accurate financial records, and assists in preparing financial reports.

org_job_positions.title: Quality Control Manager
org_job_positions.description: Develop and implement quality control procedures, conduct inspections, and ensure product standards. Responsible for plan, direct and responsible for overall development, implementation, and maintenance of the organization’s Quality Management System

org_job_positions.title: Manufacturing Manager
org_job_positions.description: Plans, oversees and direct the manufacturing process in an organisation. They ensure products and services are efficiently produced within the timeframe and budget given.

org_job_positions.title: Maintenance Manager
org_job_positions.description: Supervises maintenance staff, schedules repairs and maintenance tasks, ensures equipment is functioning properly, and maintains maintenance records.

org_job_positions.title: Supply Manager
org_job_positions.description: Responsible for overseeing the procurement, inventory management, and distribution of goods and services within the organization. They ensure the timely availability of materials while optimizing costs and maintaining quality standards.

org_job_positions.title: Marketing Manager
org_job_positions.description: Plan and execute marketing campaigns, conduct market research, and manage marketing budgets.

org_job_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager
org_job_positions.description: Develop and manage digital marketing strategies, oversee online campaigns, and analyze digital performance.

org_job_positions.title: Brand Manager
org_job_positions.description: Maintain and enhance the company's brand image, ensure consistency in branding efforts.

org_job_positions.title: Application Development Manager
org_job_positions.description: Plans, coordinates and supervises all activities related to the detailed design, development, and implementation of software or application.

org_job_positions.title: Computer Security Manager
org_job_positions.description: Computer Security Manager planning and carrying out security measures that will protect a business’s data and information from deliberate attack, unauthorised access, corruption and theft.

org_job_positions.title: IT Support Manager
org_job_positions.description: Plan, lead and oversees computer system and software maintenance and repair; assists with computer equipment purchasing and installation; and maintains networks and connectivity for users.

org_job_positions.title: Management Informatiom System Manager
org_job_positions.description: Responsible for the planning and implementation of hardware and software applications

org_job_positions.title: Cybersecurity Specialist
org_job_positions.description: Implement and manage security measures to protect the company's IT infrastructure from cyber threats

org_job_positions.title: HR Manager
org_job_positions.description: Oversees the HR department, develops HR strategies, manages recruitment and selection processes, ensures compliance with labor laws, and handles employee relations and performance management.

org_job_positions.title: Security Manager
org_job_positions.description: Manages security staff, develops security policies, monitors security systems, and ensures the safety of employees and assets.

org_job_positions.title: Occupational Health and Safety Officer
org_job_positions.description: Develops and enforces safety policies, conducts safety training, performs safety audits, and ensures compliance with safety regulations.

org_job_positions.title: Payroll Executive
org_job_positions.description: Manages payroll processing, ensures accurate and timely payment of salaries, and handles payroll-related queries. Ensures compliance with tax regulations and labor laws.

org_job_positions.title: Compensation and Benefits Specialist
org_job_positions.description: Manages employee compensation and benefits programs, including salary structures, health insurance, retirement plans, and other perks. Ensures competitive and fair compensation practices.

org_job_positions.title: Recruitment Specialist
org_job_positions.description: Manages the hiring process, including job postings, screening resumes, conducting interviews, and onboarding new employees. Works closely with department managers to understand staffing needs.

org_job_positions.title: HR Analyst
org_job_positions.description: Analyzes HR data to identify trends and make recommendations for improvements. Prepares reports on HR metrics such as turnover rates, employee satisfaction, and training effectiveness.

org_job_positions.title: Training and Development Manager
org_job_positions.description: Identifies training needs, develops training programs, and conducts training sessions. Ensures employees have the necessary skills and knowledge to perform their jobs effectively.

org_job_positions.title: Compliance Officer
org_job_positions.description: Ensures the company complies with all labor laws and regulations. Develops and implements policies to maintain compliance and conducts regular audits to identify and address any issues.

org_job_positions.title: HR Generalist
org_job_positions.description: Provides support across various HR functions, including recruitment, employee relations, training, and compliance. Acts as a point of contact for employees with HR-related queries.

org_job_positions.title: Industrial Health and Safety Engineer
org_job_positions.description: Ensure workplace safety, conduct risk assessments, and implement safety protocols.

org_job_positions.title: Machine Technician
org_job_positions.description: Machine Technician responsible for ensuring that all machinery and machine tools are working properly.

org_job_positions.title: Equipment Technician
org_job_positions.description: Equipment Technician involved in various industries. Responsibilities vary by job title. May be referred to as audio video equipment technician, medical equipment technician, heavy equipment technician, etc. according to the type of industry they work in. Involved in the installation, repair and maintenance of related equipment and training users on how to use it properly.

org_job_positions.title: Facilities Supervisor
org_job_positions.description: Oversees the maintenance and operations of the manufacturing facility, ensures safety and compliance, manages budgets, and coordinates with other departments.

org_job_positions.title: Clerk, Facilities Maintenance
org_job_positions.description: Assists the Facilities Supervisor with administrative tasks, coordinates facility-related projects, and manages vendor relationships.

org_job_positions.title: Custodian/Janitor
org_job_positions.description: Performs cleaning tasks, maintains cleanliness of the facility, and ensures sanitary conditions in all areas.

org_job_positions.title: Cleaner, Building Exteriors
org_job_positions.description: Maintains the exterior of the facility, including landscaping, snow removal, and general upkeep of outdoor areas.

org_job_positions.title: Industrial Engineer
org_job_positions.description: Analyze and improve manufacturing processes, develop quality control systems, and optimize efficiency.

org_job_positions.title: Process Engineer
org_job_positions.description: Design, implement, and optimize production processes, and ensure compliance with safety standards.

org_job_positions.title: Manufacturing Engineer
org_job_positions.description: Design and implement manufacturing processes, ensure equipment efficiency, and troubleshoot issues.

org_job_positions.title: Production Planner
org_job_positions.description: Schedule production runs, manage inventory levels, and coordinate with other departments.

org_job_positions.title: Manufacturing Technician
org_job_positions.description: Manufacturing Technician responsible for the planning and execution of production processes. They monitor quality standards and costs and provide administrative support. Their duties include procuring raw materials and equipment, appointing laborers, and liaizing with other departments.

org_job_positions.title: Production Supervisor
org_job_positions.description: Supervise production line activities, ensure quality standards, and manage team performance.

org_job_positions.title: Inventory Coordinator
org_job_positions.description: Ensure companies have all the products, materials, equipment and supplies they need to operate efficiently in ways that are aligned to established policies and standards.

org_job_positions.title: Logistics Supervisor
org_job_positions.description: Plan, direct, or coordinate transportation, storage, or distribution activities in accordance with organizational policies and applicable government laws or regulations.

org_job_positions.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
org_job_positions.description: Conduct research and improve or develop concepts, theories and operational methods, or apply existing knowledge concerning the production of food, paper, sawmill, warehouse as well as quality assurance.

org_job_positions.title: IT Support Officer
org_job_positions.description: Provide technical support to staff, troubleshoot hardware and software issues, and maintain IT equipment

org_job_positions.title: Network Analyst
org_job_positions.description: Maintain and manage the company's network infrastructure, troubleshoot network issues, and ensure network security

org_job_positions.title: Database Administrator
org_job_positions.description: Manage and maintain databases, ensure data integrity, and optimize database performance

org_job_positions.title: Technical System Administrator
org_job_positions.description: Technical System Administrator responsible for the configuration, maintenance, and reliable operation of computer systems and servers within an organization

org_job_positions.title: Software Developer
org_job_positions.description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications to support manufacturing operations

org_job_positions.title: Product Marketing Manager
org_job_positions.description: Focus on marketing specific products, develop product positioning, and create go-to-market strategies.

org_job_positions.title: Social Media Manager
org_job_positions.description: Manage the company's social media presence, create engaging content, and interact with followers.

org_job_positions.title: SEO Specialist
org_job_positions.description: Improve the company's search engine rankings, optimize website content, and manage SEO strategies.

org_job_positions.title: Content Marketing Specialist
org_job_positions.description: Create and manage content for marketing campaigns, including blogs, social media, and other digital content.

org_job_positions.title: Customer Service Manager
org_job_positions.description: Ensures that the customers of a company are satisfied with the services. They develop effective customer service procedures, policies, and standards.
org_job_positions.role: Customer Support, After Sales Service, Account Manager

org_job_positions.title: Chief Technical Officer (CTO)
org_job_positions.description: Oversee all aspects of their company’s technology strategy, including planning for future technologies and systems, developing new products or services, maintaining existing systems, and managing relationships with outside vendors.

org_job_positions.title: Research and Development Manager
org_job_positions.description: Plan, direct and coordinate research and development activities, whether internally or externally from an external research organization, to develop or improve methods of technical process, product, knowledge, or use of materials.

org_job_positions.title: Business and Product Development Manager
org_job_positions.description: plan, direct and coordinate the business services activities of the company or organization concerned. Responsible for plan, organise, direct, control and coordinate sales and marketing activities of an enterprise or organisation.
